about_the_game:
Dive into the expanse above the clouds. Hopwander a small indie game that unfolds a tale of mystery, puzzles, and unlikely heroes. Take control of a charming frog as you navigate through puzzles, engage in delightful conversations with quirky characters and face monsters.

🐸 Meet Your Froggy Companion:
Take control of your endearing frog and guide them through a sky bound realm filled with charm.


🧩 Puzzles Galore:
Challenge your mind with a variety puzzles scattered throughout the sky lands. Uncover hidden secrets, unlock mystical gates, and solve riddles that will test your wit. Each puzzle solved brings you one step closer to unraveling the mysteries of this world.


🦄 Encounter Quirky Characters:
Engage in delightful conversations with a cast of fun characters that inhabit the land. From quirky creatures to wise mentors, each encounter brings a touch of humor and warmth to your journey. Forge new friendships and uncover the narratives that shape the land.


⚔️ Face Monsters with Courage:
Face a variety of monsters that inhabit the skies. Armed with a few surprises up your sleeve, engage in charming battles that require strategy and skill. Defeating these foes brings you closer to mastering the art of froggy combat.


Are you ready to leap into the unknown and discover the secrets that await above the clouds? The cozy skies are calling, and your froggy adventure begins now!

  • Graphics: GTX 960 / r9 380
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
